headline: LEYBOLD OERLIKON ROTARY VANE PUMP 32.5 CFM
description: Two Stage Rotary Vane Vacuum Pump      Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D40BCS
Pumping Speed 32.5 CFM (918.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.50E-3(En) torr (2.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 3 HP
Accessories

This pump available with or without filtration systems;
Inquire about availability and pricing

Other Information

Pump is available in 200-220/380VAC 50Hz 3 phase configuration, inquire when ordering
Nominal Displacement: 32.5 CFM
Ultimate partial pressure with gas ballast closed: Ultimate total pressure with gas ballast open: <3.8E-3
Water vapor tolerance: 30 Torr
Oil capacity: min = 1.8 qt, max = 2.7 qt
Pump rotational speed: 1755 rpm

Power Requirements 230/460 V 10.0 A 5.0 A(2) 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Depth 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Height 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
Weight 200 lb (91 kg)
